content: boomerang shawl by natasha sills materials note this pattern can be made with any yarn any gauge - at least one 100 gram or two 50 gram balls of yarn knit until you run out of yarn or until the shawl reaches the - larger-than-recommended needle size for a loose gauge size you want i used about 360 yards of worsted weight handspun yarn and a size us 10 needle cast on 4 sts row 1 knit to last stitch yarn over knit into the front and back of the last stitch row 2 yarn over knit to last 2 sts knit 2 together repeat these two row until shawl reaches your desired size note for a striped effect like the shawl pictured switch yarns after every two-row repeat bind off very loosely
